text: Pediese, alt. Petiese, Peteese or Padiiset, was the name of a number of high ancient Egyptian officials and noblemen during the first millennium BCE, usually of Libyan descent. * Pediese, a prince in Athribis, around 720s BCE * Pediese, chief of the Ma and High Priest of Ptah * Pediese, author of the "Petition of Pediese" * Pediese, son of Apy, known from a statue usurped by him
title: Pediese (disambiguation)
